name: CrossCap
tag_list: retail, business-services, software, technology, marketing, marketing-management, cmo, consumer-packaged-goods, hospitality
overview:
CrossCap is a software/business services company that delivers end-to-end marketing management solutions designed to provide senior marketing professionals with a 360 view of marketing, merchandising, and store operations… in real time.

The CrossCap EMM solution offers a variety of modules (easy to install and simple to use tools) in the different areas of planning, analysis, and execution. Within our system, clients manage every step of the marketing process from its preliminary stages (budgeting, campaign creation), to the middle stages (soft-proofing, versioning, executing), to metrics analysis (archiving historical promotions, competitor media, lift and loss).

CrossCap was founded in Toronto in 2001 by a team of business-savvy engineers committed to increasing corporate efficiency. CrossCap has 80 employees, is headquartered in San Francisco, with offices in Toronto, Chicago, and Delhi.
